h1_title: How to Defeat the Stone Vanguard With Another Boss
h2_title: How to Summon the Shigandang Boss
content: This will effectively defeat the Stone Vanguard for you, and you'll earn all the associated experience and item rewards, like the Sterness of Stone.

The content is as follows:
This will effectively defeat the Stone Vanguard for you, and you'll earn all the associated experience and item rewards, like the Sterness of Stone.
